00046 template <typename Numeric> 
00047 struct Segment2 {
00048     Point2<Numeric> p0;
00049     Point2<Numeric> p1;
00050 
00051     Segment2() : p0(0, 0), p1(0, 0) { }
00052     Segment2(Point2<Numeric> p0, Point2<Numeric> p1) : p0(p0), p1(p1) { }
